com.topcoder.clients.dao.ejb3
Interface SearchByFilterUtility<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

Type Parameters:
T - The entity type to operate
Id - The type of id of entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
SearchByFilterUtilityImpl
public interface SearchByFilterUtility<T extends com.topcoder.clients.model.AuditableEntity,Id extends java.io.Serializable>

This interface represents the SearchByFilterUtility interface. This interface defines the method needed to search entities using a given filter as criteria.

THREAD SAFETY: Implementations of this interface should be thread safe.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Mafy, TCSDEVELOPER

Method Summary
 java.util.List<T> search(com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.Filter filter)
          Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of all entities that match the given filter in the persistence.
 

Method Detail

search

java.util.List<T> search(com.topcoder.search.builder.filter.Filter filter)
                                                                            throws DAOException
Defines the operation that performs the retrieval of all entities that match the given filter in the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.

Parameters:
filter - the filter that should be used to search the matched entities. Should not be null.
Returns:
the list with entities that match the given filter retrieved from the persistence. If nothing is found, return an empty list.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if filter is null.
DAOException - if any error occurs while performing this operation.
